title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using Build 20011106, with a .java file open in the editor, and clicking the new class button, the 'Enclosing Type' field is blank.
EB: The 'Enclosing Type' field should default to the current type in the editor.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a .java file in the editor.
2. Click the new class button.
3. Check the 'Enclosing Type' field.
